name: Creative Console
description:
Create unique games in Creative Console! Through various creative cards such as rules, characters, maps, objects, etc. Creative gameplays and levels are combined to make other players admire and become great game designers!

By challenging the creative games in the community, get the star coupons, and evolve games!

Main features:


Create your game: randomly swiped cards will stimulate your creativity! You will place objects, learn skills, set difficulties, and finally combine your ideal play.

Infinite possibilities: here, all combinations are decided by players, and each one will be a unique experience.

Evolving excellent Games: when you find excellent games, you can consume stars to continue to evolve. The evolved games will belong to you. If other players replay or like, they will earn stars for you.

Join the community: become a member of the creative game console community! Please be sure to try other players' games, and you will definitely get inspiration from them!
